keywords: ['latin dance music', 'zumba', 'amateur recording', 'poor quality', 'female voice', 'shouting', 'male vocal', 'melodic singing', 'strong bass', 'loud electronic drums', 'energetic']
caption: This is an amateur recording of a dance performance over a latin dance music piece in the style of zumba. There is a female dance instructor shouting directions to the dancers. There is a male vocalist singing melodically in the background piece. A strong bass and a loud electronic drum beat can be heard very distinctly. The atmosphere is energetic. The quality of the recording is quite poor.
